TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示安全性權杖管理員，指定安全性權杖的提供、驗證及序列化方式。

span.span: Represents a security token manager that specifies how security tokens are provided, authenticated, and serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在需要自訂的安全性權杖、安全性權杖驗證器或安全性權杖提供者時，您可以使用 類別。Use the class when you need a custom security token, security token authenticator, or security token provider. 您可以使用自訂安全性權杖來處理 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 不支援的憑證。Use a custom security token to handle credentials that [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] does not support. 當 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 提供的驗證方法不足時，您可以使用自訂安全性權杖驗證器。Use a custom security token authenticator when the authentication methods [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] provides are not sufficient. 類別在 方法中會傳回安全性權杖驗證器。A class returns a security token authenticator in the method. 安全性權杖提供者會為傳出 SOAP 訊息提供安全性權杖。A security token provider provides security tokens for outgoing SOAP messages. 類別在 方法中會傳回安全性權杖提供者。A class returns a security token provider in the method. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 使用自訂安全性權杖驗證器和安全性權杖提供者，請參閱[自訂認證與認證驗證](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/custom-credential-and-credential-validation.md)。 using custom security token authenticators and security token providers, see [Custom Credential and Credential Validation](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/custom-credential-and-credential-validation.md). [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 建立自訂安全性權杖，請參閱[How to： 建立自訂權杖](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-token.md)。 creating a custom security token, see [How to: Create a Custom Token](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-token.md).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public MustOverride Function CreateSecurityTokenAuthenticator (requirement As SecurityTokenRequirement, ByRef resolver As SecurityTokenResolver) As SecurityTokenAuthenticator

public: abstract System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenAuthenticator ^ CreateSecurityTokenAuthenticator(System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenRequirement ^ requirement, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenResolver ^ % resolver);

summary.span: 取得符合指定之安全性權杖需求的安全性權杖驗證器。

span.span: Gets a security token authenticator that meets the specified security token requirements.

returns.span: ，驗證傳入 SOAP 訊息中的安全性權杖是否符合指定需求。

span.span: A that authenticates security tokens in incoming SOAP messages that meet the specified requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供型別，這些型別能夠為傳出 SOAP 訊息提供安全性權杖並驗證傳入 SOAP 訊息中的安全性權杖。A class provides types that can provide security tokens for outgoing SOAP messages and authenticate security tokens in incoming SOAP messages. 方法會傳回類別，這個類別可驗證符合 `tokenRequirement` 參數中指定條件的安全性權杖。The method returns a class that can authenticate security tokens that match the criteria specified in the `tokenRequirement` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider CreateSecurityTokenProvider (System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement tokenRequirement);

Public MustOverride Function CreateSecurityTokenProvider (tokenRequirement As SecurityTokenRequirement) As SecurityTokenProvider
public: abstract System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenProvider ^ CreateSecurityTokenProvider(System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenRequirement ^ tokenRequirement);
public abstract System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider CreateSecurityTokenProvider (System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement requirement);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenProvider CreateSecurityTokenProvider(class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement requirement) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function CreateSecurityTokenProvider (requirement As SecurityTokenRequirement) As SecurityTokenProvider
public: abstract System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenProvider ^ CreateSecurityTokenProvider(System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenRequirement ^ requirement);

summary.span: 取得符合指定之安全性權杖需求的安全性權杖提供者。

span.span: Gets a security token provider that meets the specified security token requirements.

returns.span: ，提供符合傳出 SOAP 訊息之指定需求的安全性權杖。

span.span: A that provides security tokens that meet the specified requirements for outgoing SOAP messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供型別，這些型別能夠為傳出 SOAP 訊息提供安全性權杖並驗證傳入 SOAP 訊息中的安全性權杖。A class provides types that can provide security tokens for outgoing SOAP messages and authenticate security tokens in incoming SOAP messages. 方法會傳回可驗證安全性權杖的類別，這個安全性權杖能夠提供符合 `tokenRequirement` 參數中指定條件的安全性權杖。The method returns a class that can authenticate security tokens that can provide security tokens that match the criteria specified in the `tokenRequirement` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer CreateSecurityTokenSerializer (System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion version);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer CreateSecurityTokenSerializer(class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion version) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function CreateSecurityTokenSerializer (version As SecurityTokenVersion) As SecurityTokenSerializer
public: abstract System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenSerializer ^ CreateSecurityTokenSerializer(System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenVersion ^ version);

param.name: version
param.span: ，指定安全性權杖符合的 WS-\* 規格版本。

span.span: A that specifies the WS-\* specification versions that security tokens adhere to.

summary.span: 取得 XML 序列化程式，可將指定 WS-\* 規格版本中的安全性權杖序列化。

span.span: Gets an XML serializer that can serialize security tokens in the specified version of the WS-\* specifications.

returns.span: 要序列化安全性權杖的 。

span.span: A to serialize the security tokens.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要新增自訂權杖的序列化支援，請從 衍生類別並為 方法傳回該類別的執行個體。To add serialization support for a custom token, derive a class from and return an instance of that class for the method. 衍生自 類別的 類別能夠將 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 所附的安全性權杖序列化及還原序列化。The class, which derives from the class, is capable of serializing and deserializing the security tokens that ship with [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]. 因此，若要為序列化程式新增自訂權杖支援，請在 類別中覆寫虛擬方法，並新增程式碼來檢查所要的安全性權杖是否為自訂權杖，如果不是則呼叫基底類別 (Base Class) 方法。Thus, to add support for a custom token to the serializer, override the virtual methods in the class, add code that checks whether the desired security token is the custom token, and, if not, call the base class method.
